channel.title: Python on A Hugo website
channel.description: Recent content in Python on A Hugo website

item.title: Edit image using python
item.description: from PIL import Image, ImageFilter image1 = Image.open('1.png') image2 = image1.filter(ImageFilter.CONTOUR) image2.save('2.png') image1.show() image2.show() Figure 1: image1. Figure 2: image2.
